member.name: M:PaycorTest.API.Controllers.ProductController.Get(PaycorTest.API.Models.Request.GetFilteredProductsRequest)
member.summary: Search for a Product with different search parameters
member.param: GetFilteredProductsRequest - ProductName: Part of the Product Name for search, SellDateTime: Selling start date, PaginationData: data for Current Page and number of Rows per Page, Keywords: Words for match in Product Description
member.returns: Paged and filtered collection of Products

member.name: M:PaycorTest.API.Controllers.PurchaseOrderDetailController.Get(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get PurchaseOrderDetail by purchaseOrderId and purchaseOrderDetailId

member.name: M:PaycorTest.API.Controllers.PurchaseOrderDetailController.GetLineTotalAndOrderQtySumPerDay(PaycorTest.API.Models.Request.GetAggregatedLineTotalAndOrderQtyInTimePeriodRequest)
member.summary: Obtain sum of Line Total and Order Quantity in specified time period grouped per day
member.param: GetAggregatedLineTotalAndOrderQtyInTimePeriodRequest - StartDate: beggining of specified time period, EndDate: end of specified time period, PaginationData: defines current page and number of rows per page
